Epoch.note: Counts based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/de/de2/particles_lapi/swri_projected-magb-cdf/1981/de2_lapi_projected-magb_19810815130852_v01.cdf. The most common cadence, 500000000 [ns] = PT0.5S, occurred for all 2990 timesteps.
